TextView.android:text:
On the main screen press the "+" button to make a new class. 
Classes are like folders in which you can store sets of cards. 
For example you could make a class: "CMPS 121" 
 
Click the delete button to toggle "Delete Mode" 
When "Delete Mode" is on clicking on an item will delete it. 
 
Clicking on the created class will take you inside the class. 
Inside you can find and create your sets. 
An example of a set would be Midterm 1 
 
Clicking on a set will take you inside the set 
Here you will find your individual cards. 
 
Clicking the play button will take you into "Quiz Mode" 
In "Quiz Mode" you can review through all your flashcards. 
Tapping the card will flip it over. 
If you know the card, press the check button. 
If you need to review the card more, press the "x" button.
